hero.title: 关于我们
hero.subtitle: 了解Tensorlinx的使命、愿景和价值观

intro.title: 我们是谁
content: Tensorlinx是一家专注于计算机基础设施建设的科技企业。我们致力于推动计算机科学技术到全球边缘地带，我们受新世家DAO资助成立。
我们正在建设一家去政治化、多元人种的全球性科技企业。在遵循各国出口管制与国际合规框架的前提下，我们致力于让技术与产品惠及更多国家和地区。

members.name: 吴翔
members.title: 执行董事兼CEO
members.bio:
2024/5/31创立tensorlinx并成为创始人
2026/2/25担任新世家DAO联席主席
负责tensorlinx公司行政事务与技术研发

members.name: 颜才祥
members.title: 监事（已离职）
members.bio:
2024/5/31加入tensorlinx公司后担任监事及审计工作
2024/10/21正式退出公司治理层

members.name: 阿米特·帕特尔
members.title: 非执行董事
members.bio:
2024/5/31加入tensorlinx公司并担任非执行董事
由新世家DAO联席指派监管公司的协议人员

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Learn about Tensorlinx's mission, vision, and values

intro.title: Who We Are
content: Tensorlinx is a technology company focused on computer infrastructure construction. We are committed to promoting computer science technology to global edge regions, funded and established by NAVF DAO.

We are building a depoliticized, multi-ethnic global technology company. While adhering to export controls and international compliance frameworks of various countries, we are dedicated to making technology and products benefit more countries and regions.

members.name: Wu Xiang
members.title: Executive Director & CEO
members.bio:
Founded Tensorlinx on 2024/5/31 as the founder
Appointed as Co-Chairman of NAVF DAO on 2026/2/25
Responsible for Tensorlinx administrative affairs and technology R&D

members.name: Yan Caixiang
members.title: Supervisor (Resigned)
members.bio:
Joined Tensorlinx on 2024/5/31 as Supervisor and Auditor
Officially resigned from corporate governance on 2024/10/21

members.name: Amit Patel
members.title: Non-Executive Director
members.bio:
Joined Tensorlinx on 2024/5/31 as Non-Executive Director
Appointed by NAVF DAO Co-Chairman to supervise company protocol personnel
